statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, content_type FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE content_type = 'image';
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, content_type, performance_data ->> 'likes' AS likes FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, influencer_id, content_type FROM influencer_content_metadata ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, performance_data->>'likes' AS likes FROM influencer_content_metadata WHERE content_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM influencer_content_metadata GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_content > 5;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts, MAX(created_at) AS latest_post_date FROM influencer_content_metadata GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, AVG((performance_data->>'likes')::int) AS avg_likes FROM influencer_content_metadata GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY avg_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, performance_data FROM InfluencerContentMetadata;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerContentMetadata WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, views, likes, shares FROM ContentPerformanceData WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerContentMetadata ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, performance_data FROM InfluencerContentMetadata WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, performance_data FROM InfluencerContentMetadata ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, performance_data FROM InfluencerContentMetadata WHERE influencer_id = 100;
SELECT content_id, SUM(views) AS total_views, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(shares) AS total_shares FROM ContentPerformanceData GROUP BY content_id HAVING total_views > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerContentMetadata JOIN ContentPerformanceData ON InfluencerContentMetadata.content_id = ContentPerformanceData.content_id;
SELECT influencer_id, content_id, performance_data FROM InfluencerContentMetadata WHERE influencer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM Posts GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT id, impressions, engagement_rate FROM PerformanceData WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY followers ASC;
SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT caption, likes, comments FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND likes > 100 ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT post_id, impressions, reach FROM PerformanceData WHERE engagement_rate > 0.1 AND click_through_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY reach DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, avg_likes_per_post FROM Influencers ORDER BY avg_likes_per_post DESC;
SELECT post_text, likes_count FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id = 3;
SELECT post_text, comments_count FROM Posts ORDER BY comments_count ASC;
SELECT optimization_id, optimized_text, optimized_image_url FROM Optimization WHERE optimization_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes_count, comments_count FROM Posts WHERE likes_count > 1000 AND comments_count > 500;
SELECT p.post_id, p.post_text, pd.impression_count, pd.engagement_rate FROM Posts p JOIN PerformanceData pd ON p.post_id = pd.post_id;
SELECT o.optimization_id, o.optimized_text, p.post_text FROM Optimization o JOIN Posts p ON o.post_id = p.post_id WHERE LENGTH(o.optimized_text) > 100;
SELECT * FROM Influencer;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer ORDER BY followers_count desc;
SELECT influencer_name, content_count FROM Influencer WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, clicks, likes, shares FROM PerformanceData ORDER BY likes desc, shares asc;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencer
SELECT content_id, influencer_id, content_type, publish_date FROM Content ORDER BY publish_date DESC
SELECT data_id, content_id, clicks, likes, shares, comments FROM PerformanceData WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT recommendation_id, content_id, recommended_content_id, recommendation_score FROM Recommendation WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8
SELECT optimization_id, content_id, strategy, optimization_score FROM Optimization
